no_cases =int(raw_input())
for t in range(no_cases):
    bling=raw_input()
    j,cost=0,0
    u_bling=set(bling)
    for b in u_bling:
        if(b.isalpha()):
            if(bling.count(b)%2==0):
                cost+=(bling.count(b))/2
            else:
                cost+=(bling.count(b)+1)/2
    print int(cost)
